full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Into-Plane Aviation Fuels**
=====================================================================

**Title / Titre:** Into-Plane Aviation Fuels

**Reference Number / Numéro de Rèfèrence:** PW-__HL-654-81424

**Publication Date / Date de Publication:** 2022-10-13

**Tender Closing Date / Date limite des soumissions:** 2022-11-02T14:00:00

**Description / Description:**

This tender announcement is a request for bid (RFB) for National Master Standing Offers (NMSOs) for aviation fuels (Into-Plane) in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board (CGSB) standards. The scope of work includes delivery of aviation fuels to various locations in Canada on an as-and when-requested basis from December 1, 2022, up to and including May 31, 2024.

**Trade Agreements / Accords commerciaux:**

This tender is subject to the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and other applicable trade agreements.

**Procurement Method / Méthode d'approvisionnement:**

Competitive bidding is the procurement method for this tender. Any interested supplier may submit a bid.

**Selection Criteria / Critères de sélection:**

The selection criterion for this tender is lowest/lower bid.

**Delivery Date / Date de livraison:**

The delivery date for this tender is within the period of December 1, 2022, up to and including May 31, 2024.

**Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement / Entente sur les revendications territoriales globales:**

No comprehensive land claim agreement applies to this tender.

**Documents / Documents:**

The tender document is available in both English and French. 

**Contact Information / Informations de contact:**

If you have any questions or need further information regarding this tender, please contact:
Bobbi MacLeod
Bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
(873) 354-1451

**Notice / Avis:**

Please note that this tender has expired (Tender Status: Expired).

The tender documents can be accessed at the following links:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/12/3034d012f4ca50f0436206fb4136c5b3/ABES.PROD.PW__HL.B654.E81424.EBSU000.PDF
